alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:55AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek at Brownsville at Powder Springs affecting Paulding and Cobb Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Austell, Austell, Austell, Sweetwater Creek below Austell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek at Brownsville at Powder Springs. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands...fields and pastures of the natural flood plain upstream and downstream from the gage at Brownsville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM EST.
